name: ReassureMe
0:
”Alexa ask Reassure Me to reassure me”
”Alexa ask Reassure Me to say something comforting”
”Alexa tell Reassure Me to say something reassuring”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: reassure me
des:
Reassurance and comfort when times are tough and you are feeling stressed, anxious or overwhelmed.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Reassure Me or "Alexa, open Reassure Me".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
